|rev2 = [[Billboard (magazine)|Billboard]] |rev2score = (?) [http://www.billboard.com/bbcom/content_display/reviews/albums/e3id1068ba-
907a57d3bd3319fee90d0b681 Billboard review] }} 'The Turn' is the title of the seventh solo music recording/album
of singer/songwriter Alison Moyet. The album includes the singles "One More
Time" and "A Guy Like You" as well as three tracks first written and performed
in 2006 for stage play Smaller, in which Moyet starred with comedienne and long-
time friend Dawn French. The Turn is the singer's first release on the W14 Music
label and debuted at #21 on the UK album charts on 22 October 2007.
